tool.name: Enter_or_update_operation_metadata

param.name: in_workspace
param.displayname: File geodatabase where the processed data from the helicopter will be stored
param.dialogReference: If you have refreshed the utilities tool after running it the first time to set parameters then this should already show the correct gdb. If the wrong gdb is shown, update it to the correct one.

param.name: data_source_location
param.displayname: Enter the time the operation went "Toxic" i.e 0910
param.dialogReference: Enter a time after the helicopters started their first bait flights but before the first data download. This filters out any helicopter flight path data recorded from when the helicopter leaves it's base or pre operation boundary flight checks.

param.name: helicopter_info
param.expression: {RegNo {Pilot Name} {Helicopter Type} {Bucket Size (kg)} {Sow rate (kg/ha)};RegNo {Pilot Name} {Helicopter Type} {Bucket Size (kg)} {Sow rate (kg/ha)}...}
param.dialogReference:
Enter the helicopter's 3-letter registration number, usually found on the side of the helicopter. If it is only two letters, standard practice is to prefix H to it, so XY becomes HXY.

Click the add button to save this in the bow below and repeat for each helicopter.

Click in each relevant cell within the table then enter/select the appropriate values. Pilot's name is manual, the rest need to be selected from the picklists provided. If the value you need doesn't appear you must still select one of the options.

tool.summary: Use this tool to enter or update info on the helicopters used in the operation. The helicopters recorded here will appear in the helicopter picklist options in the "Copy Tracmap data" tool.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Use this tool to enter or update info on the helicopters used in the operation. The helicopters recorded here will appear in the helicopter picklist options in the "Copy Tracmap data" tool.
